mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, phone, email, password, salt, createTime, updateTime) values (#{id}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
insert into t_user_info (userId, nick, avatar, sign, birth, gender, createTime) values (#{userId}, #{nick}, #{avatar}, #{sign}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update t_user_info set
nick = #{nick},
avatar = #{avatar},
sign = #{sign},
birth = #{birth},
gender = #{gender},
updateTime = #{updateTime} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_user_info where 1=1
and nick like concat('%', #{nick}, '%')
